dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A hiker in the mountains near Almaty, just a tragic story coming out of Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A hiker in the mountains near Almaty, just a tragic story coming out of Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: New details have emerged regarding the tragic incident that occurred in the mountains near Almaty.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it's a bit confusing because initially they thought it was related to a rockfall on May 2nd in the Alma-Arasan Gorge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it's a bit confusing because initially they thought it was related to a rockfall on May second in the Alma-Arasan Gorge.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier reports suggested the woman may have died as a result of a rockfall on May 2 in the Alma-Arasan Gorge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, but then the Emergency Situations Ministry clarified that it actually happened on May 4th near the Gorelnik waterfall.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, but then the Emergency Situations Ministry clarified that it actually happened on May fourth near the Gorelnik waterfall.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: However, the rescue operations unit of the Emergency Situations Ministry clarified that the tragedy occurred later"on May 4"in the area near the Gorelnik waterfall.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And they made it clear it wasn't connected to that earlier rockfall, which thankfully had no casualties.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they made it clear it wasn't connected to that earlier rockfall, which thankfully had no casualties.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Officials stated the incident was not related to the earlier rockfall, during which no casualties were reported.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So rescuers found her body at 2,500 meters up, along with medics and a canine unit—no signs of life.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So rescuers found her body at two thousand, five hundred meters up, along with medics and a canine unit-no signs of life.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "On May 4, at an altitude of 2,500 meters near the Gorelnik waterfall, rescuers together with medics and a canine unit discovered the body of a young woman showing no signs of life.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That's so sad. And the cause of death hasn't been officially confirmed yet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's so sad. And the cause of death hasn't been officially confirmed yet.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The official cause of death has not yet been determined.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But eyewitnesses on social media are saying a rock fell on her and couldn't be moved by hand.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But eyewitnesses on social media are saying a rock fell on her and couldn't be moved by hand.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: However, eyewitnesses on social media claimed that a rock fell on the woman and could not be moved manually.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which is just… awful. It makes you think about how dangerous those mountains can be.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is just... awful. It makes you think about how dangerous those mountains can be.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. The rescue unit mentioned they've done over 80 operations there since the start of the year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. The rescue unit mentioned they've done over eighty operations there since the start of the year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to rescue officials, more than 80 operations have been conducted in the Almaty mountains since the beginning of the year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, and they've rescued more than 100 tourists, including 20 children—that's a lot of activity.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, and they've rescued more than one hundred tourists, including twenty children-that's a lot of activity.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over 100 tourists have been located and rescued, including 20 children.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it's not the first tragedy either; there was that skier killed in an avalanche earlier.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it's not the first tragedy either; there was that skier killed in an avalanche earlier.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Previously, a skier was killed in an avalanche in the Almaty mountains.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Really highlights the risks of mountain tourism, even in popular areas like Almaty.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Really highlights the risks of mountain tourism, even in popular areas like Almaty.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Makes you appreciate the work these rescue teams do, but also how unpredictable nature can be.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. Makes you appreciate the work these rescue teams do, but also how unpredictable nature can be.
